name: HeartBeat Voyage
description:
A story-driven game with interesting light-based mechanics.

You are a person waking up from stasis on a space ship. Unfortunately, during the long voyage something went wrong, and the whole ship is infested with monsters.

If on a 1080p monitor, please play in full-screen.

Controls:

1. Use WASD to move

2. Left mouse button toggles a flashlight (second level).

3. Press E to interact on monitors.
